metadata.purpose: Follow up ALL M1 flagged domains including academic transition, social, mood, bullying, and support
metadata.adaptiveTrigger: Students flagged in M1 for any domain

scenarios.triggerCondition: Always ask first for ALL students

questions.question: I have felt pressured to do something I didn't want to do by friends or peers.
I feel respected and valued by my friends.
I have at least one trusted adult I can talk to when I'm worried.
I can say 'no' when friends ask me to do something I am not comfortable with.
At home, I feel comfortable sharing my problems with my family.

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 Q3 >=3 OR M1 Q4 >=3 (Grade 8 feels harder OR low academic confidence)
scenarios.improvementThreshold: If Q1 or Q2 shows improvement, academic adjustment is progressing

questions.question: How is the Grade 8 schoolwork feeling now compared to a few weeks ago?
How confident do you feel about keeping up with your subjects now?
Have you sought help from teachers or tutors for difficult subjects?
Do you understand the material being taught in your toughest subject?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 Q5 >=3 OR M1 Q6 = No/Not sure (Feels not included OR no close friend)
scenarios.improvementThreshold: If Q1 or Q3 shows improvement, social integration is developing

questions.question: How included do you feel in your class now?
Do you have at least one close friend you can share personal things with now?
Have you made any effort to join group activities or make new friends?
Do you feel comfortable being yourself at school?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 Q7 >=3 (Felt sad, empty, or hopeless often/almost always)
scenarios.improvementThreshold: If Q1 shows improvement, mood is stabilizing

questions.question: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you felt sad, empty, or hopeless without a clear reason?
Have you talked to anyone about how you've been feeling?
Do you feel like your mood has improved compared to a few weeks ago?
Do you have activities or hobbies that help you feel better?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 Q8 = Yes (Experienced bullying, insults, or exclusion)
scenarios.improvementThreshold: If Q1 = Yes or shows improvement, bullying situation is resolving

questions.question: In the last 2 weeks, has anyone at school or online made you feel bullied, insulted, or left out?
Has the situation improved since you reported it or since M1?
Do you feel safe at school now?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 Q9 = No or Not sure (No adult at school to talk to)
scenarios.improvementThreshold: If Q1 = Yes, support system is developing

questions.question: Is there an adult at school you feel you can talk to now if something is bothering you?
Do you know how to reach the school counselor if you need help?
Do you have someone at home you can talk to about your problems?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 Q13 >=2 OR M1 Q22 >=3 (Would do risky things for friends OR friends pressure to share personal things)
scenarios.improvementThreshold: If Q1 or Q2 shows improvement, boundary-setting is developing

questions.question: I would do something risky if my friends dared me to.
Friends pressure me to share personal things I don't want to share.
Do you feel comfortable saying 'no' to your friends when you don't want to do something?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 Q17 >=3 (Feels like parents don't understand the real them)
scenarios.improvementThreshold: If Q1 or Q2 shows improvement, family communication is developing

questions.question: I feel like my parents understand me better now.
Have you tried talking to your parents about school or how you feel?
Do you feel your parents support you, even when you're struggling?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 indicated ongoing worries

questions.question: Are you still feeling worried or stressed?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged low self-concept about strengths

questions.question: Can you name at least one thing you're good at?
Have you used any of your strengths recently?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Auditory Processing domain

questions.question: Are you still finding it hard to follow instructions in class?
Have you tried sitting closer to the teacher to hear better?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Body Image domain

questions.question: Is comparing yourself to others online still making you feel down?
Have you been able to spend less time on apps that make you feel bad?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Girls Health domain

questions.question: Have you had to miss school or sports recently because of cycle pain?
Do your parents know how much discomfort you are in?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Identity domain

questions.question: Are you feeling more confident about your own unique strengths now?
Do you feel like you have to change who you are to fit in with friends?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Learning Disability domain

questions.question: Is your hand still getting tired quickly when you have to write?
Have you talked to your parents about the words blurring on the page?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Memory Processing domain

questions.question: Do you still find yourself needing more time than others to understand lessons?
Does it help when the teacher explains things one-on-one?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Online Safety domain

questions.question: Have you had to block anyone recently because they made you feel unsafe?
Do you feel more confident about staying safe online now?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Physical Disability domain

questions.question: Are you still feeling left out of activities because of your physical condition?
Is there an activity you'd like to join if we could make it easier for you?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Physical Health domain

questions.question: Are you still feeling exhausted even after a full night's sleep?
Have you been having more headaches or stomach aches lately?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Resilience domain

questions.question: Is your role model still inspiring you to handle challenges better?
Have you found any new ways to bounce back after a bad day?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Social Media Risk domain

questions.question: Has anyone else asked you for private photos or info online?
Do you feel safe when you are on your phone at night?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Substance Detail domain

questions.question: Have you felt pressured to try cigarettes or alcohol with your friends?
Are you worried about how much your friends are using substances?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Tech/Lifestyle domain

questions.question: Is your phone still keeping you awake past your bedtime?
Have you been able to take more breaks from your screen this week?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Tech/Social Media domain

questions.question: Are people still being mean or leave you out of group chats?
Have you been able to ignore the mean comments on social media?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Trauma domain

questions.question: Are you still seeing or hearing scary things at home or in your neighborhood?
Do you feel safe when you are walking home from school?

scenarios.triggerCondition: M1 flagged in Working Memory domain

questions.question: Are you still finding it hard to remember more than one instruction at once?
Does writing things down help you remember them better?

actionProtocol.improved: Continue current support; maintain routine monitoring
actionProtocol.noChange: Brief check-in within 1 week; provide additional resources
actionProtocol.worsened: Counselor follow-up within 3 days; reassess support strategy
